General.Name: Valiant Holding AG
General.Description: Valiant Holding AG, together with its subsidiaries, provides financial products and services in the areas of financing, investments, retirement planning, payments, and savings in Switzerland. The company offers savings; real estate financing; loans for working capital and other basic services for businesses; unsecured and consumer loans; payment transaction services through its mobile banking app; and retirement planning and investment solutions, as well as electronic banking services. It provides its products and services to private retail clients, affluent clients, self-employed individuals and small companies, and medium-sized companies. Valiant Holding AG was founded in 1824 and is based in Lucerne, Switzerland.
